name: Line of four
description:
Line of Four (also known as Connect 4, Four in a line and more) is a classic two player abstract strategy game. You have connect four pieces vertically, horizontally or diagonally to win. Select column to drop your piece.

Game features:
- one & two players mode
- very strong AI player with four difficulty levels
- statistics for each difficulty level
- great gameplay
- user friendly & intuitive interface

Have fun!
